# Tableau

## Sign Up for Tableau Public

You must create a **Tableau Public account** before working with the tool.

### Steps

1. Visit the Tableau Public website:  
   https://public.tableau.com/
   <!-- TODO: screenshot - Tableau Public landing page -->

2. Click **Sign In** (top right).
   <!-- TODO: screenshot - Sign In button -->

3. Click **Create one now**.
   <!-- TODO: screenshot - Create account link -->

4. Enter your:
   - Email
   - Name
   - Password

   <!-- TODO: screenshot - Tableau Public registration form -->

5. Accept the terms and click **Create account**.

6. Check your email and verify your Tableau account.  
   Verification is required before you can publish dashboards.

<!-- TODO: screenshot - email verification -->

## Download

Download **Tableau Public** from the official website:  
[https://public.tableau.com/app/discover](https://public.tableau.com/app/discover)

<!-- TODO: screenshot - Tableau Public download page -->

Choose the installer for your operating system:

- Windows (Tableau Public for Windows)
- macOS (Tableau Public for Mac)
